mapper.select: SELECT o.order_cd ,o.user_id ,o.facility_goods_cd ,o.goods_ctg_cd ,o.order_price ,o.order_user_point ,o.order_used_point ,o.order_pay_price ,o.order_reg_date ,o.order_pay_state FROM goods_order AS o WHERE o.order_cd = #{orderCd}

SELECT o.order_cd, o.user_id, o.facility_goods_cd, o.goods_ctg_cd, o.order_price, o.order_user_point, o.order_used_point, o.order_pay_price, o.order_reg_date, o.order_pay_state, g.facility_cd, f.facility_nm FROM goods_order AS o INNER join facility_goods AS g on o.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd INNER join facility AS f on g.facility_cd = f.facility_cd

SELECT o.order_cd ,o.user_id ,o.facility_goods_cd ,o.goods_ctg_cd ,o.order_price ,o.order_user_point ,o.order_used_point ,o.order_pay_price ,o.order_reg_date ,o.order_pay_state ,(SELECT f.facility_nm FROM facility AS f WHERE f.facility_cd = g.facility_cd) FROM facility_goods AS g INNER join goods_order AS o on g.facility_goods_cd = o.facility_goods_cd INNER join user AS u on o.user_id = u.user_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT o.order_cd ,o.user_id ,o.facility_goods_cd ,o.goods_ctg_cd ,o.order_price ,o.order_user_point ,o.order_used_point ,o.order_pay_price ,o.order_reg_date ,o.order_pay_state ,g.sports_cd ,g.facility_cd ,g.user_id ,g.facility_goods_reg_date ,s.facility_stadium_nm ,s.facility_stadium_cd ,s.facility_stadium_detail ,f.facility_cd ,f.facility_nm ,f.facility_tell FROM goods_order AS o INNER join facility_goods AS g on o.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd INNER join facility_stadium AS s on s.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd INNER join facility AS f on f.facility_cd = s.facility_cd WHERE o.order_cd = #{orderCd}

SELECT o.order_cd ,o.user_id ,o.facility_goods_cd ,o.goods_ctg_cd ,o.order_price ,o.order_user_point ,o.order_used_point ,o.order_pay_price ,o.order_reg_date ,o.order_pay_state ,g.sports_cd ,g.facility_cd ,g.user_id ,g.facility_goods_reg_date ,l.lesson_cd ,l.lesson_nm ,l.lesson_price ,l.lesson_detail ,f.facility_cd ,f.facility_nm ,f.facility_tell FROM goods_order AS o INNER join facility_goods AS g on o.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd INNER join lesson AS l on l.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd INNER join facility AS f on f.facility_cd = l.facility_cd WHERE o.order_cd = #{orderCd}

SELECT o.order_cd ,o.user_id ,o.facility_goods_cd ,o.goods_ctg_cd ,o.order_price ,o.order_user_point ,o.order_used_point ,o.order_pay_price ,o.order_reg_date ,o.order_pay_state ,g.sports_cd ,g.facility_cd ,g.user_id ,g.facility_goods_reg_date ,p.pass_cd ,p.pass_nm ,p.pass_unit ,p.pass_price ,f.facility_cd ,f.facility_nm ,f.facility_tell FROM goods_order AS o INNER join facility_goods AS g on o.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd INNER join facility_pass AS p on p.facility_goods_cd = g.facility_goods_cd INNER join facility AS f on f.facility_cd = p.facility_cd WHERE o.order_cd = #{orderCd}
